## quatFromEuler variable

Constructs a quaternion from given rotation angles in specified `order`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
quatFromEuler: (order: "xyz" | "yxz" | "xzy" | "zxy" | "yzx" | "zyx", a: number, b: number, c: number) => import("@thi.ng/vectors").Vec
```
